welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Thetford, the charming market town known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and experience all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marham RAF Airport offers a range of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Cambridge Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norwich International Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Norwich International Airport is a private facility for business and VIP travelers, offering personalized services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
